userStories.title: Create scraper directory structure
acceptanceCriteria: Create scraped_builds/onallcylinders/urls.json for storing discovered URLs
Create scraped_builds/onallcylinders/html/ subdirectory for HTML files

userStories.title: Scrape all article URLs from paginated gallery
acceptanceCriteria: Handle pagination (45 pages, URL pattern: /page/2/, /page/3/, etc)
Extract all individual article URLs from each page
Log total count of URLs found (expected ~746 articles)
userStories.notes: Standard pagination, not infinite scroll. Each article card has link to full article.

userStories.title: Create HTML scraping script
acceptanceCriteria: For each URL, fetch full HTML content
Handle rate limiting with delays between requests
userStories.notes: Be respectful with rate limiting. Save progress to allow resuming if interrupted.

userStories.title: Execute full scrape of all articles
acceptanceCriteria: All article HTMLs saved to disk
userStories.notes: This may take a while with 700+ pages. Manifest should include: url, filename, title, scraped_at timestamp
